          • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters.SimpleBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    BusinessObjectClass - the business object class which is represented by the current wrapper
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapperSimplified<BusinessObjectClass,android.app.Activity>
    Enclosing class:

    public abstract static class SmartAdapters.SimpleBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
extends SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
implements SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapperSimplified<BusinessObjectClass,android.app.Activity>
    The same exact purpose of its parent class, except that the ActivityClass type parameter is bound to the actual Android built-in class.

        public android.view.View createNewView(android.app.Activity activity,
                              android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                              BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
        Description copied from class: SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper
        Is responsible for creating a new View, which is able to represent the provided business object.
        Specified by:
        createNewView in interface SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapperSimplified<BusinessObjectClass,android.app.Activity>
        Specified by:
        createNewView in class SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,android.app.Activity,java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity which hosts the view
        parent - the parent view, as provided by the Adapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) method
        businessObject - the business object the returned view will represent graphically
        Returns:
        a new view, which will be used by the underlying Adapter
